Title: Helly type theorems for the sum of vectors in a normed plane
Abstract: © 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.The main results here are two Helly type theorems for the sum of (at most) unit vectors in a normed plane. Also, we give a new characterization of centrally symmetric convex sets in the plane.
